thread.title: BRIEF-Shanghai Pudong Development Bank To Offer Credit Line Of Hk$19.64 Bln To Its Unit

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shanghai Pudong Development Bank To Offer Credit Line Of Hk$19.64 Bln To Its Unit

organizations.name: brief-shanghai pudong development bank to offer credit line
shanghai pudong development bank co ltd

text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Shanghai Pudong Development Bank Co Ltd :
* SAYS BOARD APPROVES TO OFFER CREDIT LINE OF HK$19.64 BILLION ($2.51 billion) TO ITS UNIT SPDB INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LTD Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2CfX8Gf Further company coverage: ($1 = 7.8195 Hong Kong dollars) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
